description.plain: M-City J.r. is a Detroit-based rapper, and leader of the Yacht Club Social Network music collective.

body.plain: M-City J.r. is a Detroit-based rapper, and leader of the Yacht Club Social Network music collective.

songs.full_title: Addicted to My Ex by M City JR
songs.title: Addicted to My Ex

description.plain:
Detroit rapper M-City J.r. has some petty fun at the expense of his former lover in “Addicted To My Ex.”

He’s not addicted to her in the sense of getting back with her—instead, he’s interested in showing off in front of her for entertainment.

The song was accompanied by a comedic music video—M-City starts out as an overweight slob, dumped by his girlfriend, and then loses weight, gets money, and comes back to show off with his new girl.

songs.embed_content: Read “Addicted to My Ex” by M City JR on Genius
